### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://aniwave.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Faniwave.to) ### Comment > The problems occurs when you pause the episode, an in-page pop-up ad-image appears in front of the screen. Though this issue can be resolved through updating the AdGuard filters, but the issue will return after a couple of months, even with the Fanboy Annoyance filter enabled, the filter that is designed to remove these in-page pop-ups. Though there was no issue until tone of the streaming servers got an update and name rebranding this issue returned, though I found a way to fix it and I thought I had resolved the issue, it reappeared again yesterday. > Like what is the issue here?
